titleStmt.title: Steps to the temple sacred poems, with other delights of the muses / by Richard Crashaw ...
titleStmt.author: Crashaw, Richard, 1613?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Second part has special t.p.: The delights of the muses, or, Other poems written on severall occasions.
Table of contents: p. [1]-[4] at end.
